data.text:
The list of reforms Democrats put forward are commonsense and reasonable policies that state and local law enforcement already follow across the country. And, it's what the American people are insisting on to protect our rights.

It's up to Republicans now to come to the table. https://t.co/xM3uZFLAUq
Mark, thank you for your years of service on behalf of Nevadans. Paul and I are wishing you and your family all the best in this next chapter of your life. https://t.co/oVC937UNc8

When I push Trump and his cronies on what they're doing to lower costs, they point to No Tax on Tips.

Now, I support No Tax on Tips. But what good does that do for hospitality workers if Trump's recklessness drives away tourists and they lose their jobs? https://t.co/HDQrZoK1RU

If you missed it yesterday - @SenateDems called up a bill to allow the Senate to sue for the release of the remaining Epstein Files. Republicans blocked it.

Why are Senate Republicans standing in the way of truth and transparency? https://t.co/WXbWEw888P

I introduced a bipartisan bill today to help grow our tourism industry with our partners in Canada and Mexico. With all of the damage this President and his cronies have done to our economy, I will continue working to put Nevadans first. https://t.co/hebuMueD44

Taxpayers' data has always been held to strict standards to protect sensitive information, just like Social Security. The Trump Admin. has no business putting this data at risk of exposure for its deportation scheme.

I've repeatedly supported these key privacy protections, and https://t.co/XjqdEZFS9j

Kristi Noem should have resigned months ago. The brutality she and Stephen Miller have enabled in Minneapolis and across America are exactly why we need real accountability and independent investigations. https://t.co/jjXJ31AIT9

Scott Bessent and the Trump Administration want to talk up the economy, but workers in Nevada aren't seeing it.

What's worse, they don't seem to care about the impacts their recklessness have had on our tourism economy. https://t.co/jWbQBjS1gn

The truth is solar energy can lower costs for families and businesses while creating jobs here in America. It doesn't matter if you're a Republican or Democrat, we can all see it.

So why is the President so insistent on killing American solar? https://t.co/rtLizp92MF

Each day brings a new low from this disgraceful President.

Donald Trump is fully responsible for the racist post against the Obamas, apologizing shouldn’t even be a question. https://t.co/R7rX0zKC65
